description: Erection of hip to gable and L-shaped roof extensions and installation of 2 no. front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and L-shaped roof extensions and the installation of 2 no. front rooflights to facilitate a loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Details of the Application SubmissionIn accordance with the requirements of Local Government Act 1972 details of the application submission were available on the Council's website during the assessment of the application.https://www.kingston.gov.uk/info/200155/planning_applications_and_permissions/263/find_a_planning_application_or_appeal

Existing and proposed plans must be provided seperatelyPlease provide existing and proposed floor plans at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for the proposed works.
